Package interfaces

Interface IUserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserService
public interface IUserService
Interface for user-related services, including login, password management, and retrieving user roles.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    changePassword(String hospitalID, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
    Changes the password for a user.
    UserRole
    getUserRole(String hospitalID)
    Retrieves the role of a user based on their hospital ID.
    boolean
    login(String hospitalID, String password)
    Authenticates a user based on their hospital ID and password.

  • Method Details

    • login

      boolean login(String hospitalID, String password)
      Authenticates a user based on their hospital ID and password.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The unique hospital ID of the user.
      password - The user's password.
      Returns:
      true if the login is successful; false otherwise.

    • changePassword

      boolean changePassword(String hospitalID, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes the password for a user.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The unique hospital ID of the user.
      oldPassword - The user's current password.
      newPassword - The user's new password.
      Returns:
      true if the password is successfully changed; false otherwise.

    • getUserRole

      UserRole getUserRole(String hospitalID)
      Retrieves the role of a user based on their hospital ID.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The unique hospital ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The UserRole of the user (e.g., PATIENT, DOCTOR, PHARMACIST, ADMINISTRATOR).
